description: This file sets up an Agent with an Azure AI Foundry model and demonstrates how to generate and print a response to a prompt.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with an AI model to generate responses.

classes.name: AzureAIFoundry
classes.description: A model class representing Azure AI Foundry integration.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to print the response generated by the agent for a given prompt.
